author: desruisseaux
msg: More accurate return type in MetadataStandard.getInterface/getImplementation(...) methods,
and added a trivial Characters.isHexadecimal(int) method to be needed later for a JSON parser.

author: jacopoc
msg: Fix for a typo and an important optimization: enabled cache lookup for the retrieval of SystemProperty records.

msg: UIMA-3941 DUCC Web Server (WS) needs to add --role_administrator to Services requests, accordingly
